title: How to Make a Drum
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 183 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 520L
description: In How to Make a Drum, students will learn about the materials needed and the steps involved in making a drum. Readers are supported by high-frequency words and detailed illustrations. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events as well as connect to prior knowledge as they read this interesting and informative how-to book.
reviewWords: balloon, cardboard, construction paper, drum, drumsticks, rubber bands, scissors, stretch, tube
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /u/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word make
